name: Pickled Jerusalem Artichokes
keywords: coriander seeds, jerusalem artichokes, white wine vinegar, side dish, winter
recipeIngredient: 1 pound Jerusalem artichokes, peeled, sliced into pieces 1/4 inch thick and 1 inch long

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the water and vinegar to a boil. Add the rest of the ingredients and simmer until the Jerusalem artichokes are tender on the edges but still quite crisp in the center, about 3 minutes. Remove from the heat and let cool. Pour into a container and chill up to a week.
